duties_responsibilities.duty: Assess business operations to manage legal and operational risks around sensitive proprietary information.
Develop policies, procedures, and training regimens for privacy compliance.
Oversee all data agreements and liaise with a global privacy legal team.
Handle customer-facing privacy matters and support client's business interactions.
Lead and mature privacy compliance programs by working collaboratively with internal teams, vendors, auditors, and stakeholders.
Liaise between product teams and a Fortune 500 Global Privacy office to understand privacy implications and ensure compliance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Legal Studies, Data Management, or a related field (Master's preferred)
One or more of the following IAPP Certifications (CIPP, CIPM, CIPT)
